ImportAlpha module

Created on Mon Oct 24 12:51:46 2022

@author: minah

This script contains functions to be imported to main script meant for data from Alpha Centauri laboratory ..Functions to be imported to main file

ImportAlpha.EnergyProdDay(data)

Calculates energy production from one day in kWh

Parameters

data : DataFrame

Returns

energy : float64

ImportAlpha.change_column_names(dataframe)

Replaces long columnn names with shorter and better column names

Parameters:

dataframe : DataFrame

Returns

dataframe : DataFrame

ImportAlpha.input_from_array(prompt, array, message)

Gives the user a new chance to enter a valid input if they enter an invalid input. The message to be printed if the value is invalid is an input. The input array is valid alternatives.

Parameters:

prompt : str array : array message : str

Returns:

value : str

ImportAlpha.load_data(FileName)

Loads data file Turn Timestamp column from str type to datetime64 type Trims the frame from 6 measurements per minute to 1 measurement per minute Changes column names

Parameters:

FileName : str

Returns:

data : DataFrame

ImportAlpha.plotPowerOneDay(data)

Creates a plot of power output one day from PV-moules User decides time interval and PV-modules

Parameters:

data : DataFrame

Returns

plot
